title: Document a Control Weakness Finding
description: Following testing, an auditor must document a finding related to inadequate segregation of duties.

tasks.description: Draft the 'Condition' part of the finding, stating that the same employee can both create a new vendor and approve payments to that vendor.
tasks.expected_outcome: The 'what is' part of the finding is clearly written.

tasks.description: Draft the 'Criteria' part, citing the company's policy on segregation of duties.
tasks.expected_outcome: The 'what should be' part of the finding is correctly cited.

tasks.description: Draft the 'Cause' and 'Effect' (Risk), explaining that this weakness could lead to fraudulent payments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The root cause and potential impact are clearly articulated.

tasks.description: Link the finding to the supporting workpaper that contains the evidence from testing.
tasks.expected_outcome: The finding is properly cross-referenced to the evidence.
